segments.text: I don't think that will do . How about the one at your back ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This one is especially built for hard , continuous play . And every detail of workmanship and material has been carefully checked to make it a dependable one for tournament use .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It do look beautiful . Well . I think I'll take it.Now do you have any racket covers ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This cover comes with the racket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much does it come up to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The mark says six hundred yuan , plus tax , it's six hundred and eighty yuan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . If you'll just wait here , I'll be right with you in a minute .
segments.speaker: S1
